text: Averill's Island, Ipswich River Wildlife Sanctuary, August 2012Averills Island is a small forested island within the marshland of the Wenham Swamp, in the Ipswich River Wildlife Sanctuary in Topsfield, Massachusetts. There is an unpaved road that connects the island with the mainland, from Bradstreet Hill to the Steward School on Perkins Row. Category:Islands of Essex County, Massachusetts Category:Topsfield, Massachusetts
title: Averills Island (Massachusetts)
